flawed_nl_solution:
Luther has 10 / 2 = <<10/2=5>>5 pieces made with cashmere.
He has 13 - 10 = <<13-10=3>>3 pieces made without silk using only cashmere.
Thus, Luther has 5 - 3 = <<5-3=5>>5 pieces made using a blend of cashmere and silk.
#### 5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
